title: Council Decision 2012/372/CFSP of 10 July 2012 amending and extending Decision 2010/330/CSFP on the European Union Integrated Rule of Law Mission for Iraq, EUJUST LEX-IRAQ
header:
11.7.2012 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 179/22
COUNCIL DECISION 2012/372/CFSP
of 10 July 2012
amending and extending Decision 2010/330/CSFP on the European Union Integrated Rule of Law Mission for Iraq, EUJUST LEX-IRAQ
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on European Union, and in particular Article 28 and Articles 42(4) and 43(2) thereof,
Having regard to the proposal from the High Representative of the Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy,
Whereas:
(1) On 7 March 2005, the Council adopted Joint Action 2005/190/CFSP on the European Union Integrated Rule of Law Mission for Iraq, EUJUST LEX (1).
(2) On 14 June 2010, the Council adopted Decision 2010/330/CFSP (2), which extended the mission until 30 June 2012.
(3) Following the recommendations in the Strategic Review, the mission should be extended for a further period of 18 months.
(4) EUJUST LEX-IRAQ will be conducted in the context of a situation which may deteriorate and could impede the achievement of the objectives of the Union’s external action as set out in Article 21 of the Treaty.
(5) Decision 2010/330/CFSP should therefore be amended accordingly,
main_body:
Decision 2010/330/CFSP is hereby amended as follows:
(1) Article 2(4) is replaced by the following:
(2) Article 2(5) is deleted;
(3) Article 6(5) is replaced by the following:
(4) Article 10 is hereby amended as follows:
(a) paragraph 1 is replaced by the following:
(b) paragraph 4 is deleted;
(c) paragraph 8 is replaced by the following:
(5) in Article 11 the following paragraph is added:
(6) in Article 16 the second subparagraph is replaced by the following:

This Decision shall enter into force on the day of its adoption.
It shall apply from 1 July 2012.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 July 2012.
For the Council
The President
A. D. MAVROYIANNIS
(1)  OJ L 62, 9.3.2005, p. 37.
(2)  OJ L 149, 15.6.2010, p. 12.
(3)  OJ L 141, 27.5.2011, p. 17.’;
